author: kelly
msg: Use MetadataTestCase as a base in order to get test data files via 'getTestDataFile'

author: kelly
msg: Use MetadataTestCase as a base in order to get test data files via 'getTestDataFile'

author: kelly
msg: A base test case that provides test data files in actual (yet temporary) filesystem path locations by copying them out of the classpath resources from org/apache/oodt/cas/metadata.
Concrete test cases extend this class and call 'getTestDataFile' to get a test data file.

author: kelly
msg: Use org/apache/oodt/cas/metadata/util/tika-mimetypes.xml as the path to the tika-mimetypes.xml file

author: veithen
msg: Attempt to fix conflicting dependencies between wss4j and opensaml. This in particular should avoid the double dependency on serializer, which I believe is the root cause of the build failures seen in Hudson.
